Born in Gloucester, United Kingdom, I'm a second-year cyber security student. I am currently embarking on a journey to move away from a career in finance and chasing my passion for technology.

Web development is my newfound love, I revel in crafting visually stunning websites where the code is my canvas as I meticulously sculpt it for clarity and purpose.

In addition to my creative pursuits, I'm driven by a keen interest in security principles. I thrive on learning and applying them to create robust technological solutions.

Join me on my journey in pursuit of creativity, precision, and an unwavering thirst for knowledge!

Project Highlights

WeatherWiz

Responsive web application that provides real-time weather information for any location.

Users can search for weather forecasts, view current conditions, and receive weather alerts.

React JavaScript CSS API

RecipeRover

Dynamic recipe finder that lets users search for recipes based on available ingredients.

It suggests recipes, creates shopping lists, and helps users cook with what they have on hand.

React JavaScript CSS API

TaskMaster

Task management web application that allows users to create, manage, and track their to-do lists.

It features user authentication and the ability to prioritize tasks.weather alerts.

React JavaScript SQL API
